meanings.sent1: The kinglets in the fairy tale were kind and wise rulers.
meanings.sent2: The kinglets of the tiny kingdom were loved by their subjects.
meanings.sent3: The kinglets decided to have a race to determine who would rule the land.
meanings.sent4: The kinglets' influence may be small, but their hearts are mighty.
meanings.sent5: The image of the kinglets sitting on their thrones will forever be etched in my mind.

meanings.sent1: The queen adorned her hair with delicate kinglets for the royal banquet.
meanings.sent2: The king's coronation included a magnificent robe with golden kinglets.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous prince placed a kinglet on his pet cat's head as a joke.
meanings.sent4: The sparkling kinglets on the crown shimmered under the palace lights.
meanings.sent5: The kinglet on the princess's head sparkled like a tiny star in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A small bird of the genus Regulus.
meanings.sent1: The kinglets flitted among the branches, their colorful feathers catching the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Birdwatchers gathered to catch a glimpse of the rare kinglets in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The kinglets chirped a cheerful tune, brightening up the gloomy morning.
meanings.sent4: The kinglets' tiny size allowed them to move swiftly through the dense foliage.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the kinglets soaring through the sky was a breathtaking moment.
